Package org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.ldap

Class CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iplanet.services.ldap.event.LDAPv3PersistentSearch<ContinuousQueryListener<org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Attribute>,​Set<Void>>
      • org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.ldap.CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContinuousQuery
    public class CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch
extends LDAPv3PersistentSearch<ContinuousQueryListener<org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Attribute>,​Set<Void>>
implements ContinuousQuery
    This class will execute persistent search request against the configured datastore. When a result is received, the listeners will be notified about the changes, so the messages can be propagated. This implementation acts to translate between the CTS's ContinuousQueryListeners and the OpenDJ LDAP supported implementation of the datastore.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.iplanet.services.ldap.event.LDAPv3PersistentSearch

    • Constructor Detail

      • CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch

        public CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch​(int retry,
                                   org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.DN searchBaseDN,
                                   org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Filter searchFilter,
                                   org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.SearchScope searchScope,
                                   ConnectionFactory factory,
                                   String... attributeNames)
        Generate a new CTSDJLDAPv3PersistentSearch, providing the connection factory to use to produce connections.
        Parameters:
        retry - The retry time to wait if the search fails for whatever reason.
        searchBaseDN - The DN to use as the start location for the query.
        searchFilter - The filter against which events on LDAP are compared.
        searchScope - The scope from the base DN under which to search.
        factory - Used to produce connections down to the CTS.
        attributeNames - Declared attributes to return from the query.

      • addListener

        public void addListener​(ContinuousQueryListener<org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Attribute> listener,
                        Set<Void> idTypes)
        Description copied from class: LDAPv3PersistentSearch
        Adds an IdRepoListener object, which needs to be notified about persistent search results. The caller must ensure that calls to addListener/removeListener/hasListeners invocations are synchronized correctly.
        Overrides:
        addListener in class LDAPv3PersistentSearch<ContinuousQueryListener<org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Attribute>,​Set<Void>>
        Parameters:
        listener - The IdRepoListener instance that needs to be notified about changes.
        idTypes - The supported IdTypes for which events needs to be generated.
